DataElement.preferredName: Patient Philadelphia Chromosome Negative Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no applicable indicator related to a patient with negative lab test confirmation of a translocation between chromosomes 9 and 22 to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Philadelphia Chromosome Negative Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient with negative lab test confirmation of a translocation between chromosomes 9 and 22 to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Philadelphia Chromosome Negative Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A translocation between chromosomes 9 and 22. It is the hallmark for chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML).:A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A translocation between chromosomes 9 and 22. It is the hallmark for chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML).
A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
